data.expected_result: you should get a notification saying discord doesn’t have access to photos
data.short_description: Share extension doesn’t give the “discord doesn’t have access to your photos message”, when you have photos disabled for discord.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to iOS settings, and scroll down to discord  - Select discord and go to the photo permissions - Select never and close out of settings  - Now go to photos and find a picture you want to share  - Hit the square with a arrow pointing up - Scroll over to discord and select it - Set the server location and hit post
